title: RIGHTTMM - Wear watch face
summary: RIGHTTMM watch face app for Android Wear - truly minimal
description: RIGHTTMM is a designer watchface app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. Have a great TTMM.Compatible with Huawei Watch, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3Idea & design : Albert SalamonAndroid programming : Artur SalamonÂ© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
descriptionHTML:
RIGHTTMM is a designer watchface app for Android Wear devices. App has a nine colors customization and works in ambient mode. Have a great TTMM.

Compatible with Huawei Watch, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3

Idea & design : Albert Salamon
Android programming : Artur Salamon

© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
